ly15_qz18.mini.view

Interface ICRView2CRModelAdapter<UserObj,ChatRoomObj>

  • Type Parameters:
    UserObj - the user generic object.
    ChatRoomObj - chat room generic object.

    public interface ICRView2CRModelAdapter<UserObj,ChatRoomObj>
    The chat room mini view to chat room mini model adapter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void exitChatRoom()
      Exit this chat room.
      ChatRoomObj getChatRoom()
      Get chat room object from model.
      void requestChatRoomList(UserObj user)
      Request chat rooms list a user created or joined.
      void sendEmoji(javax.swing.ImageIcon img)
      Send emoji to this chat room.
      void sendFile(java.io.File file)
      Send file to this chat room.
      void sendText(java.lang.String text)
      Send text to this chat room.
      void startGame(int numOfTeams, int teamCapacity)
      Start the game.

    • Method Detail

      • exitChatRoom

        void exitChatRoom()
        Exit this chat room.

      • sendText

        void sendText(java.lang.String text)
        Send text to this chat room. All users' corresponding chat room will receive the text.
        Parameters:
        text - is sent to this chat room.

      • sendFile

        void sendFile(java.io.File file)
        Send file to this chat room. All users' corresponding chat room will receive the file.
        Parameters:
        file - is sent to this chat room.

      • sendEmoji

        void sendEmoji(javax.swing.ImageIcon img)
        Send emoji to this chat room. All users' corresponding chat room will receive the emoji.
        Parameters:
        img - is sent to this chat room.

      • getChatRoom

        ChatRoomObj getChatRoom()
        Get chat room object from model.
        Returns:
        chat room generic object.

      • requestChatRoomList

        void requestChatRoomList(UserObj user)
        Request chat rooms list a user created or joined.
        Parameters:
        user - The user.

      • startGame

        void startGame(int numOfTeams,
               int teamCapacity)
        Start the game.
        Parameters:
        numOfTeams - - number of teams.
        teamCapacity - - the max team capacity.
